name: [Prototype] SpeedRunner
description:
Tiny project from late 2015 during college exams, made in 2 days. The idea is simple: Get to the finish line within 2 minutes. Made with a simple 80's and neon aesthetic. Direct X 9 or higher capable GPU/CPU is needed to run. 

Player Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look

Space - Jump

R - Reload Level
